```{python, echo = TRUE}
import numpy as np

def soda_simul(this_state):
  u=np.random.rand(1)
  if (this_state == "c"):
    if(u<=0.7):
      next_state = "c"
    else:
      next_state = "p"
  else:
    if(u<=0.5):
      next_state = "c"
    else:
      next_state = "p"
  return next_state
for i in range(5):
  path ="c"
  for i in range (9):
    this_state=path[-1]
    next_state=soda_simul(this_state)
    path=path+next_state

  print(path)
```
